content: I can design very nice brochures (a small booklet) for my clients with text, images, and graphics to convey information in a visually appealing way to promote their products/ services. Software: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Indesign, Adobe Illustration
In addition, I also have the ability to create illustrations with many different topics using Adobe Illustration and Blender.
These paintings were completed by me on the Procreate application.
I know how to design innovative and sophisticated logos, and packaging with realistic product mockups.
This is a graphic designed to advertise a candy store with the sweet colour tones of candy.
I have a strong command of Adobe Photoshop software and can skillfully combine its tools to design engaging posters and images.
These are the banners and standees I created to fulfill my company's advertising needs during my time as a co-op student.
I have researched the skills of using AI tools to generate images to keep up with trends.
